title: Strengthening Customer Service Competencies: Customized Science Concept Instruction Design for Visually Impaired University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic science concepts at the middle school level
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately define over 80% of the core terms required to explain the science concept (structure of matter).
Learners can combine tactile models and audio descriptions to reproduce the experimental process in three or more steps.
Learners achieve a 75% or higher correct response rate on formative assessments evaluating conceptual understanding.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
